data.message:
YOU'RE A WINNER!*
UEFA EURO 2016™, here you come!* 
Get excited Talithia because you have won* 4 tickets for you and 3 friends or family to Quarter Finalists Vs. Quarter Finalists at Stade de Vélodrome on the 30th June 2016
The full prize is four tickets to the UEFA EURO 2016™ match and £400 to help with you get there! , Can't Beleive it, all those codes i put in off the coke bottles and they just rung me, so excited thank you cocacola :)

replies.message: Congratulations Talitha, we hope you have a fantastic time at #Euro2016. We look forward to seeing the photos!
